postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
EagleWIngs II accommodates up to 6 guests in 3 well-appointed cabins and is available for the charter in the stunning waters of our neighbouring countries - Indonesia, Malaysia & Thailand Island. 
 
 
15 guest for a small party, gathering cruising along the coastline of Singapore and southern islands, relax in the pristine turquoise waters or on the white sand beach.  
 
 
Accommodation  
- Number of cabins: 3  
- Cabin configuration: 2 Double, 1 Twin  
- Bed configuration: 2 Queen, 2 Single  
- Number of guests: 6-15  
 
 
All cabins have ensuite bathrooms.  
The saloon space is typical of Sunseeker, offering open space enjoying floods of natural light due to large windows.  
Entertainment system, Air Con, Water toys  
 
 
The main deck houses the dining and lounge were you can connect with music systems from your personal devices and watch on LCD screen.  
The upper deck has an open air dining space and day beds at the back and front of the yacht. The view of water splashing as the yacht sailed was eye-catching.  
Day beds that are cushioned allows room for ultimate relaxation throughout the sail.  
 
 
Custom events on the yacht away from distractions of the city...  
... bring your dream to life!!  
 
 
For more info.  
email : 
  show contact info 
   
Text/WhatsApp : 
  show contact info
title: Having a small PRIVATE PARTY?? Charter EagleWings Yacht....

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
EagleWIngs II accommodates up to 6 guests in 3 well-appointed cabins and is available for the charter in the stunning waters of our neighbouring countries - Indonesia, Malaysia & Thailand Island. 
 
 
15 guest for a small party, gathering cruising along the coastline of Singapore and southern islands, relax in the pristine turquoise waters or on the white sand beach.  
 
 
Accommodation  
- Number of cabins: 3  
- Cabin configuration: 2 Double, 1 Twin  
- Bed configuration: 2 Queen, 2 Single  
- Number of guests: 6-15  
 
 
All cabins have ensuite bathrooms.  
The saloon space is typical of Sunseeker, offering open space enjoying floods of natural light due to large windows.  
Entertainment system, Air Con, Water toys  
 
 
The main deck houses the dining and lounge were you can connect with music systems from your personal devices and watch on LCD screen.  
The upper deck has an open air dining space and day beds at the back and front of the yacht. The view of water splashing as the yacht sailed was eye-catching.  
Day beds that are cushioned allows room for ultimate relaxation throughout the sail.  
 
 
Custom events on the yacht away from distractions of the city...  
... bring your dream to life!!  
 
 
For more info.  
email : 
  show contact info 
   
Text/WhatsApp : 
  show contact info
title: Boat Booking for Events Venue

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Noel Boyd is a dynamic master of ceremonies that has performed in Singapore, Malaysia, Jakarta, Thailand and India. His fun personality enables him to emcee and command the attention of his audience at every event! He enjoys emceeing as his motto goes "Live and breathe to entertain, that's exactly what I was born to do". 
 
Noel began hosting corporate events in 2004. He has done an array of corporate events from dinner and dances, carnivals, awards nights, theme parties and roadshows. His spontaneous, creative and quirky character always adds value to an event and allows him to easily adapt to all types of audiences. Twelve years of emceeing experience allows Noel to read his audience and think on his feet which ensures every show is a success.
title: Emcee Noel Boyd

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Baby Swimming Teacher Training Course 
Birthlight infant aquatics courses bring together principles of body balance in water, swimming teaching techniques, research on the teaching of water safety skills for babies and the positive effects of joyful parent-baby interaction on overall child development. 
 
Date: 10 - 14 January 2017 
Time: 9am - 5pm 
Location : Singapore 
 
Tots Swimming Teacher Training Course 
To equip Baby Swimming teachers with resources to  
a) effectively integrate toddlers new to water in aquatic classes  
b) offer toddlers with experience of baby swimming classes skills and incentives to progress to fully independent swimming 
 
To establish best foundations for body balance and strokes, using birthlight techniques for teaching rotations and surfacing to breathe 
 
To impart life-saving skills through progressive techniques for jumping and turning back to raft or poolside 
 
To enhance physical wellbeing and stimulates communication between parents and their children in ways that nourish the spirit and strengthen family bonds. Songs and games based on years of teaching experience are used to facilitate effective skill integration in a playful and relaxed atmosphere. 
 
Date: 15 - 16 January 2017 
Time: 9am - 5pm 
Location : Singapore 
 
For enquiries, contact Inspire Mum & Baby at: 
Call: 9234 1866 
Email: 
  show contact info
title: Baby & Tots Swimming Teacher Training Course - January 2017

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Morning Charters Promotion from $1700.. 
 
Boasting an incredible living space of 300 square metres, EagleWings is one of Singapore's largest catamarans -- a truly majestic location for any party or wedding. 
 
With its majestic exterior, the boat is even more impressive inside with sleek and modern furnishings such as spacious decks, a jacuzzi, fully-equipped bar, 10-seater dining space, and four luxurious cabins for overnight stays.  
 
Available for hourly, breakfast, lunch, dinner or full-day charters to short get-away. 
EagleWings can hold up to 50 guests onboard. 
​ 
Water toys (Seadoo S​ea Scooter, Sea Eagle​ Kayak, Island Hopper Banana Whale Boat) are included.  
Ideal for family, friends and team-bonding.  
 
** ​We welcome you to visit​ our fleet​ at ONE°15 Marina, Sentosa. 
Book now for early celebration!! 
 
# Limited period ONLY!!
title: Special Promo on EagleWings Yacht Charters

QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Surprise your friends & family for Christmas, birthday,saintValentine ,weddings,groom and any special party in Montreal! 
 
Send your nice & delicious cakes to Montreal and be diffrent! 
 
You are searching a fantastic cake for any occasion (birthday, anniversary, valentine and marriage and so on ..) to send as a surprise to a friend in Montreal , canada?!  
 
we invite you to take a look at our cake gallery page in our website : www.patisserielavande.com 
 
Eggs free , gluten free & sugar free are available also.We are sure that you will find your one. 
 
Plus cake model, you can choose all details about your cake. 
Every things are HALAL. 
From base cake, filling taste, topping, nut & fruit, the note on the cake to the accessory you want on delivery (greeting card, candle, balloons, magic sparkler, etc...) 
 
Even you can send us your cake model, and then our chef will take your idea to reality!! 
 
Tax included! no delivery fee for Montreal Island and Laval. 
 
We accept any credit cards as well as PayPal for online payment. 
 
www.patisserielavande.com 
 
 
 
****************************************************************************** 
 
Vous êtes en train de chercher un gâteau fantastique pour n'importe quelle occasion (anniversaire, Saint-Valentin et le mariage et ainsi de suite..) ??? 
 
Nous vous invitons à jeter un coup d'œil à notre galerie page de gâteau dans notre site Web: www.patisserielavande.com 
 
Nous sommes sûrs que vous trouverez vôtre.les gâteau sans eaufs , sans gluten et sans sucre sont disponible. 
 
En plus de modèle de gâteau, vous pouvez aussi choisir tous les détails sur votre gâteau. 
 
Comme : le gâteau de base, remplissage et goût, garniture, de noix et de fruits, la note sur le gâteau, même l'accessoire que vous désirez avoir lorsque la livraison (comme carte de vœux, bougies, ballons, magique cires, etc.) 
 
Vous pouvez aussi nous envoyer votre modèle de gâteau, puis notre chef prendra votre idée à la réalité !! 
 
Tax inclus, aucun frais de livraison pour l'île de Montréal et de Laval. 
 
On accepte toutes les cartes de crédit ainsi que PayPal pour effectuer le paiement en ligne. 
 
 
 
www.patisserielavande.com
title: Send your nice & fresh cakes to Montreal!
